item.description:
* SAT JUNE 5 Night at the Copa with the CT Theatre Group Discount *
Saturday, JUNE 5, 2010, 8pm
The Bushnell Center for the Performing Arts
Mortensen Hall
166 Capitol Avenue,
Hartford CT 06106

. Tiempo Libre
Two-time Grammy-nominated Tiempo Libre is one of the hottest young Latin bands today. Equally at home in concert halls, jazz clubs and dance venues, the members of the Miami-based group are true modern heirs to the rich musical tradition of their native Cuba.

Tiempo Libre’s members were all classically trained in Havana’s premiere conservatories. Now, the group is a hit in the U.S. and abroad, celebrated for its incendiary, joyful performances of timba – an irresistible, dance-inducing mix of high-voltage Latin jazz and seductive rhythms of song
FREE Parking on Capital Ave
BUY ONLINE AND GET OUR 20% GROUP DISCOUNT
USE CREDIT CARD, DEBIT CARD, GIFT CARD or PAYPAL

Balcony Tickets are $32.50 * Only $25 While Tickets Remain

Mezzanine Tickets are $42.50 * Only $35 While Tickets Remain

Orchestra Tickets are $55.50 * Only $45 While Tickets Remain

BUY ONLINE AND GET OUR GROUP DISCOUNT
20% OFF ALL TICKETS

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CT THEATRE GROUP SECTION
THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pick up your tickets at the Will Call window before the show

Visit http://www.CTheatreGr... or call (860) 987-7888

Be the first to know about our NEW EVENTS – Visit http://www.CTTheatreG... and sign up for our Email Newsletter
item.how_to_find_us: Meet the CT Theatre Group before the show, or pick up your tickets at the will call window

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
